about_the_game:
Overview

Aquarium at August 32nd is a short walking simulator game inspired by the well-known horror simulator Exit 8. In this game, players explore a spooky aquarium filled with anomalies and must find a way to exit by identifying these differences.

The rule of Aquarium at August 32nd is simple: turn back if there is an anomaly, or go forward if there is none. The game is completed when the number of jellyfish in the tank reaches eight.

Play time: 15 to 60 minutes

Video Distribution Guidelines

Both individuals and corporations can distribute without permission.

Monetization is possible only when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.

We will not be liable for any damages whatsoever resulting from the distribution of videos of this game.

The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Controls

[Mouse & Keyboard]

Move: W, A, S, D keys

Run: Shift key

Camera control: Mouse movement

[Gamepad]

Move: L stick

Run: Press L stick or L trigger

Camera control: R stick

Option Setting

In the options menu, the following settings are available

Language: 日本語 / English

window mode: full screen / window

Frame Rate Upper Limit: Adjustable up to 60

Volume: Adjustable from 0.0 to 1.0

Camera Sensitivity: Adjustable from 0.0 to 1.0

short_description: The rumor says that strange events will come to those who recite the words to regret their summer vacation. On 32nd of August, you will become part of an urban myth. A mysterious day at the curious aquarium awaits you.
